uk.ac.macaulay.util
Class GISRGBScaledKey<T extends java.lang.Number>

java.lang.Object
  uk.ac.macaulay.util.AbstractGISRasterImageConverter<T>
      uk.ac.macaulay.util.GISScaledKey<T>
          uk.ac.macaulay.util.GISRGBScaledKey<T>
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Comparable<GISScaledKey<T>>, GISRasterImageConverter<T>, PartialOrderComparable<GISScaledKey<T>>
Direct Known Subclasses:
GISRGBLogScaledKey
public class GISRGBScaledKey<T extends java.lang.Number>
extends GISScaledKey<T>

A key operating on a single scale in RGB colour space. Two colours are specified at the minimum and the maximum of the scale. The colour to use for intermediate points is on a linear scale on the straight line through RGB space between the minimum and maximum colour points.

Author:
Gary Polhill
